Name: setAlarm
Description: Sets an alarm for the given time
Param1Description: The given time in HH:MM 24H format
Param2Description: the message or the name of the alarm

Name: createNote
Param2Description: the subject or the name of the note

Name: setTimer
Description: Sets a timer for a given period
Param1Description: The given time period in HH:MM:SS format
Param2Description: the message or the name of the reminder

Name: flipCoin
Description: Flips a coin either heads or tails

Name: callPerson
Description: Starts a call with the given person
Param1Description: The name of the given person

Name: sendText
Description: Sends a text to a person
Param1Description: The name of the given person

Name: getWeather
Description: Gets the weather on the given place in the given time

Name: toggleWifi
Description: turns on or off the Wi-fi
Param1Description: true if it needs to be turned on, false if turned off

Name: toggleBluetooth
Description: turns on or off the bluetooth
Param1Description: true if it needs to be turned on, false if turned off
